name: Huncho (TheStudio)
description:
Huncho is a pirate that has his friends turned into enemies, so help Huncho take his revenge and throw Greevo (the final alien boss) into the coffin ;)

Defeat your enemies and find your treasure...

Usually, When attacked by enemies, Huncho uses his sword to defeat them, so always try to hit and run so fast to prevent getting stabbed...

Watch Huncho dancing the CoffinDance when he throws Greevo dead...

Controls:

   - WASD or Arrows for movement

   - Z for Sword Attack 

   - SPACE for Jump

INSTALLATION TIPS: 

1- Download Huncho.rar

2- unZip the downloaded compressed file

3- run Huncho.exe

Minimum Requirements:

CPU: Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3

GPU: Intel HD Graphics (Any 1GB DX11 graphics card)

RAM: 4GB
